Summary: STAR LIKE OBJECT DEEP RED IN COLOR
divs: sighting detailswhile driving down route 3 off of i-95 towards south china in vassalboro area it was dark over route 3 what seemed like 5 miles i noticed a star like object very high up just fall to the ground the star was dark red in color droped for many thousands of feet then just hovered about 2 thosand feet above road i am doing about 40 mph and watching it my sateilite radio then started to have servere interferance at this point it hovered for 30 -40 seconds then went to the south at a high rate of speed radio worked fine after this- time was 9pm 7\25\2008 driving home from work sky was clear and mars does not do these types of displays
trends: There have been no other sightings in Vassalboro
This sighting has never been favorited.
